collectors.title: Database

queries.sql: select DISTINCT title,ct.code,ct.mtID from tbl_c1_titles as ct, tbl_dclient_c1 as cd where ct.mtID = cd.mtID and cd.cID = 2 order by ct.mtID asc
select DISTINCT title,ct.code,ct.mtID from tbl_c2_titles as ct, tbl_dclient_c2 as cd where ct.mtID = cd.mtID and cd.cID = 2 order by ct.mtID asc
select DISTINCT title,ct.code,ct.mtID from tbl_c3_titles as ct, tbl_dclient_c3 as cd where ct.mtID = cd.mtID and cd.cID = 2 order by ct.mtID asc
